title: Song of The Nephilim
description: Leo is a young man incredibly intelligent, yet emotionally tormented and who doesnâ€™t seem to find his place anywhere. He blames his rebel side for his incapacity of finding a place of his own. Yet, in reality, supernatural dark forces lurk inside his body, determining him to behave in a way which makes the others fear him. Leo is proud, sincere, rebellious and profoundly moral, he likes living in solitude and he is dark and romantic.
author: Daria Finica
